summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 2019, sent shortly after the arrest and search operations targeting Ghislaine Maxwell. It expresses appreciation for the FBI squad's efforts, highlights the successful execution of the operation, and mentions that Maxwell's attorney was contacted regarding a subpoena served electronically by an AUSA.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Subject of arrest and search operations
persons.context: The email mentions that the sender was contacted by Maxwell's attorney regarding a subpoena served electronically from an AUSA, indicating she is the target of the FBI operation.

persons.name: ASAC
persons.role: Assistant Special Agent in Charge, FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The ASAC sends a thank you message to the entire FBI team for their professionalism and resilience during the arrest and search operations, praising their commitment to the case.

persons.name: SSA
persons.role: Supervisory Special Agent, FBI New York
persons.context: The SSA forwards the ASAC's thank you message and adds their own appreciation for the squad's incredible effort during a challenging operation.

connections.description: The ASAC is leading the FBI team that conducted arrest and search operations targeting Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest and Search Operations
events.description: The FBI conducted arrest and search operations, likely targeting Ghislaine Maxwell, which involved a late-night call for reinforcements and lasted until early morning.

events.title: Subpoena Served to Maxwell's Attorney
events.description: A subpoena was served electronically from an AUSA to Ghislaine Maxwell's attorney.

keyFacts: The FBI successfully executed arrest and search operations targeting Ghislaine Maxwell in July 2019, requiring a late-night call for reinforcements and lasting into the early morning.
The operation was kept out of the media for six months, which was instrumental in ensuring the pursuit of justice could continue without delay.
Ghislaine Maxwell's attorney was contacted regarding a subpoena served electronically by an AUSA.
The FBI team demonstrated high resilience and professionalism, with members refusing to leave until the search was complete.
The email highlights the collaborative effort between FBI Operations, Intelligence, and the Operational Support Division (OSD).
